mapper.select: select p.f_name, p.p_name, op.p_size, o.order_price, opd.order_p_quant, o.order_date, o.order_idx, p.p_category from orders o join orders_pd opd on opd.order_pd_idx = o.order_pd_idx join products p on p.p_idx = opd.p_idx join option op on op.option_idx = o.option_idx where o.u_idx = #{u_idx} and o.delivery_active = 0

select p.f_name, p.p_name, op.p_size, o.order_price, opd.order_p_quant, o.purchase_date, o.order_idx, o.review_active, p.p_category from orders o join orders_pd opd on opd.order_pd_idx = o.order_pd_idx join products p on p.p_idx = opd.p_idx join option op on op.option_idx = o.option_idx where o.u_idx = #{u_idx} and o.delivery_active = 1
select p.f_name, p.p_name, p.p_price, w.wish_idx, p.p_category, p.p_idx from wishlist w join products p on p.p_idx = w.p_idx where w.u_idx = #{u_idx}
mapper.update: update address set basic = 0 where u_idx = #{u_idx} and basic = 1
mapper.insert: insert into address(u_idx, zip_code, roadAddr, jibunAddr, addrDetail, regdate) values(#{u_idx}, #{zip_code}, #{roadAddr}, #{jibunAddr}, #{addrDetail}, sysdate())
mapper.delete: delete from wishlist where p_idx = #{p_idx} and u_idx = #{u_idx}
